Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; dot band in added white between white bands; below, lotus buds in white outline; exterior: dot band at rim above Z band between lines; below on left, trace of undetermined decoration.
Curator's comments: The number '872' is written in pencil on the sherd's interior surface; also 871, deleted. Label has A872, perhaspps in pencil, with (b) added in ink.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1967) (phase 2)
